AT.name: Samurai Sword Destiny™
AT.description: Du übernimmst die Rolle der Samurai-Kämpferin Akane und hast nur ein Ziel: ihren vermissten großen Bruder finden und nach Hause zurückbringen. Akane muss auf ihrem Weg gefährliche Angriffe überstehen, feindliche Burgen überwinden und schier unbezwingbare Gegner abwehren. Es stehen Dutzende Upgrades zur Auswahl, mit denen du Akanes Kampfstärke verbessern kannst, damit sie überhaupt eine Chance hat, die Hindernisse auf ihrem Weg zu überwinden.

BG.name: Samurai Sword Destiny™
BG.description: You control a deadly female samurai, Akane, with a single goal in mind: to find and bring her missing elder brother home. On Akane’s quest, she will encounter deadly ambushes, storm enemy castle rooftops, and square off against seemingly indomitable opponents. With the help of dozens of upgrades available to enhance her fighting abilities, Akane just might have a fighting chance against the forces that stand in her path!

BE.name: Samurai Sword Destiny™
BE.description: Vous êtes dans la peau d’Akane, une redoutable femme samouraï qui n’a qu’une seule idée en tête : retrouver son grand frère disparu et le ramener coûte que coûte à la maison. Tout au long de sa quête, Akane devra faire face à des pièges mortels, envahir les toits du château ennemi et affronter des adversaires à priori invincibles. À l’aide des nombreuses mises à niveau disponibles lui permettant d’améliorer son habileté au combat, Akane aura peut-être une chance de vaincre les forces qui se dressent sur son chemin !

ES.name: Samurai Sword Destiny™
ES.description: Controlas a una samurái mortal, Akane, con un solo objetivo en mente: localizar a su hermano mayor perdido y traerlo de vuelta a casa. Durante la misión, Akane se encontrará con temibles emboscadas, invadirá azoteas de castillos enemigos y se enfrentará a oponentes de aspecto indómito. Gracias a las docenas de actualizaciones disponibles para mejorar sus capacidades de lucha, ¡Akane tendrá la oportunidad de plantar cara a las fuerzas que se entrometen en su camino!

IT.name: Samurai Sword Destiny™
IT.description: Controlli Akane, una donna samurai, che ha in mente un solo scopo: trovare e riportare a casa il suo fratello maggiore. Durante la sua ricerca, Akane incontrerà tranelli fatali, invaderà il castello dei suoi nemici, ed affronterà nemici apparentemente indominabili. Con l’aiuto degli aggiornamenti disponibili per migliorare le sue abilità, Akane avrà una buona probabilità di lottare contro le forze che le bloccano il passo!

NO.name: Samurai Sword Destiny™
NO.description: You control a deadly female samurai, Akane, with a single goal in mind: to find and bring her missing elder brother home. On Akane’s quest, she will encounter deadly ambushes, storm enemy castle rooftops, and square off against seemingly indomitable opponents. With the help of dozens of upgrades available to enhance her fighting abilities, Akane just might have a fighting chance against the forces that stand in her path!

NL.name: Samurai Sword Destiny™
NL.description: Je beheerst een dodelijke vrouwelijke samoerai, Akane, die maar een enkel doel voor ogen heeft: haar oudere broer die vermist wordt vinden en thuis brengen. Tijdens Akane’s speurtocht zal ze dodelijke hinderlagen tegenkomen, daken van vijandelijke kastelen binnenvallen en de strijd aan gaan met ogenschijnlijk onverzettelijke tegenstanders. Met behulp van tientallen beschikbare upgrades om haar vechttalenten te vergroten, heeft Akane misschien wel een kans tegen de krachten die ze op haar pad vindt!

PL.name: Samurai Sword Destiny™
PL.description: You control a deadly female samurai, Akane, with a single goal in mind: to find and bring her missing elder brother home. On Akane’s quest, she will encounter deadly ambushes, storm enemy castle rooftops, and square off against seemingly indomitable opponents. With the help of dozens of upgrades available to enhance her fighting abilities, Akane just might have a fighting chance against the forces that stand in her path!

PT.name: Samurai Sword Destiny™
PT.description: Controlas uma mulher samurai mortífera, Akane, com um único objetivo em mente: encontrar e trazer para casa o seu irmão mais velho. Akane na sua busca terá de enfrentar armadilhas mortais, invadir os telhados dos castelos do inimigo, e vencer adversários aparentemente indomáveis. Com a ajuda de dezenas de atualizações disponíveis para aumentar as suas capacidades de luta, Akane pode ter algumas hipóteses de vencer as forças que se lhe deparam no caminho!

RU.name: Samurai Sword Destiny™
RU.description: Вы управляете смертоносной женщиной-самураем Akane, у которой есть лишь одна цель: найти и вернуть домой своего пропавшего старшего брата. На своем пути Akane повстречает опасные ловушки, вторгнется на крыши вражеских замков и сразится с на первый взгляд непобедимыми противниками. Благодаря десяткам доступных улучшений боевых навыков, у Akane будет шанс справиться с врагами, стоящими на ее пути!

SE.name: Samurai Sword Destiny™
SE.description: You control a deadly female samurai, Akane, with a single goal in mind: to find and bring her missing elder brother home. On Akane’s quest, she will encounter deadly ambushes, storm enemy castle rooftops, and square off against seemingly indomitable opponents.
